scripts.local.run.test.demo:chrome:allure: npm run clean:allure-results && npm run clean:allure-report && ENV=dev npx playwright test --project=Chrome && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.local.run.test.demo:chrome:report: ENV=dev npx playwright test --project=Chrome && npx playwright show-report && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.local.run.test.fed:chrome:allure: npm run clean:allure-results && npm run clean:allure-report && ENV=qa npx playwright test --project=Chrome || exitCode=$? && ( [ -d allure-results ] && npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report || echo "❌ No allure-results folder found. Tests may not have run." ); exit $exitCode
